nodes.text: Nika Futterman (born October 25, 1969) is an American actress, singer, poker player, and voice artist that provided the voice of many characters in various Star Wars projects, the most notable being her role as Asajj Ventress in the "Star Wars: The Clone Wars" television series and film.
